library(tidyverse)
library(nnet)

# logistic regression

```{r}

data(iris)

model <- multinom(Species ~ ., data = iris)
summary(model)

AIC(model)
table(predict(model), iris$Species)


```

# K-means

```{r}

model <- kmeans(iris %>% select(-Species), 3)

table(model$cluster, as.numeric(iris$Species))

```
